医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
神经科学家发现了安慰剂效应谜题的关键部分安慰剂效应非常真实。几十年来，我们已经知道这一点，从现实生活中的观察和研究人员为许多疾病和病症（尤其是疼痛）设计的最佳双盲随机临床试验中可以看出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Neuroscientists-discover-a-key-piece-of-the-placebo-effect-puzzle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Neuroscientists-discover-a-key-piece-of-the-placebo-effect-puzzle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c45d8a5-41c8-4027-b771-48cc3b66af43 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:11:34 -0400 Neuroscientists discover a key piece of the placebo effect puzzle
“基因不当行为”在健康人群中出人意料地普遍存在科学家们发现，“基因不当行为”——基因在预期被关闭时却处于活跃状态——是健康人群中一种令人惊讶的普遍现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Gene-misbehavior-found-to-be-surprisingly-common-among-the-healthy-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Gene-misbehavior-found-to-be-surprisingly-common-among-the-healthy-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e148c7-5b6c-486e-99cd-4ee5528dd683 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 21:07:07 -0400 'Gene misbehavior' found to be surprisingly common among the healthy population
人工智能通过分析染色质图像来改善乳腺癌分期Paul Scherrer 研究所 PSI 和麻省理工学院 MIT 的研究人员正在利用人工智能来改进乳腺癌的分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/AI-improves-breast-cancer-staging-by-analyzing-chromatin-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/AI-improves-breast-cancer-staging-by-analyzing-chromatin-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9de6e3e2-b71f-44b2-95ff-764fa6ba8abb Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:58:00 -0400 AI improves breast cancer staging by analyzing chromatin images
CHEST 发布治疗中央气道阻塞的新临床指南美国胸科医师学会 (CHEST) 最近发布了关于中央气道阻塞 (CAO) 的新临床指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/CHEST-releases-new-clinical-guideline-for-managing-central-airway-obstruction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/CHEST-releases-new-clinical-guideline-for-managing-central-airway-obstruction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c7338e1-bf77-476e-beb9-6cc32aaffc54 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:54:34 -0400 CHEST releases new clinical guideline for managing central airway obstruction
减少检测差异可以大大降低美国黑人的结肠癌发病率牛津大学出版社发表在《国家癌症研究所杂志》上的一篇新论文发现，消除美国结肠癌检测中的种族差异将显着降低黑人的结肠癌和结肠癌死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Reducing-testing-disparities-could-dramatically-cut-colon-cancer-rates-among-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Reducing-testing-disparities-could-dramatically-cut-colon-cancer-rates-among-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f452199f-3ca2-49a3-832e-cae9994fdfb5 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:50:37 -0400 Reducing testing disparities could dramatically cut colon cancer rates among Black Americans
新研究有助于更好地了解脂肪肝疾病 MASH 的病理学一项新的研究使研究人员能够更好地了解脂肪肝疾病 MASH 的病理学，MASH 代表代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/New-study-helps-better-understand-the-pathology-of-fatty-liver-disease-MASH.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/New-study-helps-better-understand-the-pathology-of-fatty-liver-disease-MASH.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3553b8e8-bd1a-4056-a9de-5ead7b5eaafd Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:31:04 -0400 New study helps better understand the pathology of fatty liver disease MASH
社区药剂师帮助缩小心房颤动患者中风预防的差距Roopinder Sandhu 博士（医学博士、公共卫生硕士）表示，心房颤动 (Afib) 是临床实践中最常见的心律失常，也是老年人中风的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Community-pharmacists-help-close-gaps-in-中风-prevention-for-Afib-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Community-pharmacists-help-close-gaps-in-中风-prevention-for-Afib-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b72d9b0-e628-4b70-a973-a67990399b98 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:26:05 -0400 Community pharmacists help close gaps in stroke prevention for Afib patients
与交通相关的超细颗粒损害人类嗅觉细胞的线粒体功能一项新的研究表明，超细颗粒（UFP）是造成空气污染的最小因素，它会阻碍人类嗅粘膜细胞中线粒体的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Traffic-lated-ultrafine-articles-impair-mitochondrial-function-in- human-olfactory-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Traffic-lated-ultrafine-articles-impair-mitochondrial-function-in- human-olfactory-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12c30fbd-d4c6-4d7e-83ed-673a6ca9dfc5 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:21:12 -0400 Traffic-related ultrafine particles impair mitochondrial function in human olfactory cells
患有精神疾病的儿童今天面临着比过去更大的挑战1999年、2004年和2017年在英国进行的调查显示，与前几十年患有精神疾病的儿童相比，2017年患有精神疾病的儿童经历了更严重的困难，对学校、家庭和日常生活的影响更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Children-with-psychiatric-disorders-face-greater-challenges-today-than-in-the-past.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Children-with-psychiatric-disorders-face-greater-challenges-today-than-in-the-past.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95c57666-ee17-4365-8528-95cbabb8560e Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:15:45 -0400 Children with psychiatric disorders face greater challenges today than in the past
研究将社会脆弱性与心理健康和药物滥用障碍联系起来发表在《美国医学会杂志精神病学》上的一项新研究揭示了社会脆弱性之间的显着关联：汇总健康的社会决定因素（如社会经济地位、住房类型、教育和保险覆盖范围）的衡量标准；以及美国心理健康和药物滥用障碍的患病率和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Study-links-social-vulnerability-to-mental-health-and-substance-use-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Study-links-social-vulnerability-to-mental-health-and-substance-use-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08a110bb-c450-4935-a904-1dbacab3c903 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 20:11:12 -0400 Study links social vulnerability to mental health and substance use disorders
